dPOn5vpZTONA2gC2.name: Smoke Bomb Teleport
dPOn5vpZTONA2gC2.description: If you have a smoke bomb, you can spend a point of exertion as a bonus action to throw it at your own feet and teleport to an unoccupied space you could reach by taking your move followed by the Dash action.

system.description:
Your enemies never see you coming, and the few who you allow to survive never see you leave, either. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Dexterity or Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain Blindsight with a range of 10 feet. If you already have blindsight from another source, its range increases by 10 feet instead.
  • When you are in dim light or darkness, your Sneak Attack die increases by one step to a maximum die size of 1d10. You may also choose to have the bonus damage dealt by your sneak attack be necrotic damage.
  • If you have a smoke bomb, you can spend a point of exertion as a bonus action to throw it at your own feet and teleport to an unoccupied space you could reach by taking your move followed by the Dash action.
